backend/main.mo: Main actor for a user account system implementing registration, authentication, profile management, and role-based access control using a username/password model with case-insensitive username normalization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades actor state by building a `usernameMap` index from existing `userAccounts` data, mapping normalized usernames to their corresponding principals.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the signup page frontend was updated to normalize usernames (trim + lowercase) before backend submission, with references to the affected files and test ID REQ-10.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles in styling, routing, authentication, and UI pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, primary, and chart color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the app into a `#root` div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for login, signup, home, and user detail pages, including `beforeLoad` guards that redirect based on localStorage session presence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor, using an anonymous or authenticated identity and initializing access control with an optional admin token.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Custom hook managing a username-based auth session persisted in localStorage, exposing `saveSession` and `clearSession` helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider using `@dfinity/auth-client`, exposing login/clear functions and status flags for ICP identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend interactions; `useRegisterUser` and `useAuthenticateUser` normalize usernames via `trim().toLowerCase()` before calling the backend, and `useSearchUsers` lowercases the search prefix.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Inter font, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines dark-first CSS custom properties for theming (colors, sidebar, charts) plus a thin scrollbar utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component featuring a debounced user search input, search results list, and a header showing the logged-in user's avatar with a logout button.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with a username/password form that authenticates via a mutation hook, saves the session, and navigates to home on success.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Signup page with username/password/confirm-password fields, inline validation, password strength indicators, and auto-login after successful registration.
frontend/src/pages/UserDetailPage.tsx: User profile detail page that displays avatar, display name, and profile info rows, with skeleton loading state for the caller's own profile fetched via a query hook.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations for the frontend app.
project_state.json: Tracks project state version 7 for a WhatsApp-like messaging app, listing existing features, known issues (signup false 'username taken' error), and architectural notes.
